q1.question: How does the subscription work?
q1.answer: Choose a package that fits your needs, create an account or log in, complete the payment, and instantly unlock all premium features for the duration of your subscription.

q2.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
q2.answer: Yes, you can manage your subscription from your account settings at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.

q3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and bank transfers for your convenience.

q4.question: Do you offer refunds?
q4.answer: Please contact our support team within 7 days of purchase to discuss refund eligibility based on our refund policy.
